name: The Heirs
description: The series follows a group of wealthy, privileged high school students as they are about to take over their families' business empires, overcoming difficulties and growing every step of the way.

name: Hotel Del Luna
description: When he's invited to manage a hotel for dead souls, an elite hotelier gets to know the establishment's ancient owner and her strange world.

name: what's wrong with secretary kim
description: Directed by Park Joon Hwa, “What’s Wrong With Secretary Kim” is a much-loved 2018 kdrama based on the novel by Jung Kyung Yoon and following webcomic by Kim Young Mi. With much of the series’ inspiration coming from the original material, a star-studded cast ensures What's Wrong with Secretary Kim? is a must-watch for fans of kdramas. With endless romantic and comedic moments to enjoy, you’ll find yourself finishing the series in no time at all.
